messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Brought up in Leeds, I've worked and lived in the Pudsey constituency for 35 years. I'm now working with UKIP to: * Reduce the need for new housing on our green fields * Improve local road, rail and other essential services * Give people the full right to recall their MP if need be * Enable binding referenda on local issues like planning * Restore hope, dignity and pride in our great country Please support me so I can put your best interests first.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reduce the need for new housing on our green fields
Improve local road, rail and other essential services
Give people the full right to recall their MP if need be
Enable binding referenda on local issues like planning
Restore hope, dignity and pride in our great country

images.caption: ELECTION COMMUNICATION FOR THE UK INDEPENDENCE PARTY - ROGER TATTERSALL in Pudsey - Standing Up for Real Change
